summary: App UI theming updates for Field Service Groups and Publisher pages (color adjustments and badge styling consistency).

existing_features.title: Update the centralized Field Service Group color mapping so Group 3 uses the darker green hex color #0B6623, and ensure this new color is reflected everywhere Field Service Group colors are consumed (including Field Service Groups main page colored bars/group text/icons and Field Service Group profile pages heading text/colored bars/Record Visit button).

On the Publishers page table, update the Overseer and Assistant badges so their styling (background + text + hover behavior) matches the badge styling used for Overseer and Assistant on the Field Service Group profile page.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update Field Service Group 3 (Green) color to #0B6623 across all UI instances (main page bars/text/icons; profile headings/bars/Record Visit button).
Adjust Overseer and Assistant badges on the Publisher page table to match the badge color styling used on Field Service Group profile pages.

projectName: Darken Field Service Group 3 green and align Publisher table Overseer/Assistant badges
